##  Card Template

###### Preview

<img width="207" alt="card" src="https://github.com/Koredotcom/web-kore-sdk/assets/131746603/7b060bf7-8c87-4788-bd33-c6b50ab03007">


###### Message Payload

```javascript
var message = {
	"type": "template",
	"payload": {
		"template_type": "cardTemplate",
		'cards': [
			{
				'cardHeading': {
					title: 'It is a long established fact that a reading...',
					headerStyles: {
						'background-color': '#E7F1FF',
						'color': '#07377F',
						'border': '1px solid #85B7FE',
					}
				},
				cardDescription: [
					{
						icon: 'data:image/png;base64,',
						title: 'Oct 9, 9:00am - 9:30am (Day 1/2)'
				
					},
					{
						icon: 'data:image/png;base64,',
						title: 'WebEx'
					},
					{
						icon: 'data:image/png;base64,',
						title: 'Santiago, Brian, Felix and 5 others'
					}
				],
				cardContentStyles: {
					'border': "1px solid #85B7FE;",
				},
					buttons: [
					{
						title: 'Show Transactions',
						type: 'postback',
						payload: 'USER_DEFINED_PAYLOAD',
						buttonStyles: {
							'background-color': '#5ce454',
							color: '#fff',
							border: '1px solid #0D6EFD'
						}
					}
				],
				type: 'action',
			},
			{
				'cardHeading': {
					title: 'It is a long established fact that a reading...',
					headerStyles: {
						'background-color': '#0D6EFD',
						'color': '#FFFFFF',
						'border': '1px solid #0D6EFD',
					}
				},
				cardDescription: [
					{
						icon: 'data:image/png;base64,',
						title: 'Oct 9, 9:00am - 9:30am (Day 1/2)'
				
					},
					{
						icon: 'data:image/png;base64,',
						title: 'WebEx'
					},
					{
						icon: 'data:image/png;base64,',
						title: 'Santiago, Brian, Felix and 5 others'
					}
				],
				cardContentStyles: {
					'border': "1px solid #0D6EFD",
				},
				type: 'postback',
				default_action: {
					'title': 'Card One submitted successfully',
					payload: 'USER_DEFINED_PAYLOAD'
				}
			},
					{
				"cardHeading": {
					"title": "It is a long established action.",
					"description": "Description",
					"icon": "data:image/png;base64,"
				},
				"cardtype": "list",
				"cardDescription": [
						{
						"icon": "data:image/png;base64,",
						"title": "1901 Thornridge Cir. Shiloh, Hawaii 81063"
					},
					{
						"icon": "data:image/png;base64,",
						"title": "1902 Thornridge Cir. Shiloh, Hawaii 81063"
					},
					{
						"icon": "data:image/png;base64,",
						"title": "1903 Thornridge Cir. Shiloh, Hawaii 81063"
					}
				],
				"buttons": [
					{
						"title": "Button",
						"type": "postback",
						"payload": "USER_DEFINED_payload",
						"buttonStyles": {
							"background-color": "#0D6EFD",
							"color": "#fff",
							"border": "1px solid #0D6EFD"
						}
					}
				],
				"type": "action"
			},
					{
				"cardHeading": {
					"title": "It is a long established postback",
					"description": "Description"
				},
				"cardContentStyles": {
					"border-left": "5px solid #0d6efd"
				},
				"type": "postback",
				"default_action": {
					"title": "Card 3 submitted successfully",
					"payload": "USER_DEFINED_payload"
				}
			},
		]
	}
}
print(JSON.stingify(message));
